# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
**French and English Simultaneous Interpretation Services for In-Person, Virtual, and/or Hybrid Meetings/Events**

## Reference Number
`cb-8137-96001205`

## Official Invitation Number
`1000032416`

## Announcement Date
`2023-08-15`

## Tender Closing Date
`2023-10-11T14:00:00`

## Ammendment Date
`2023-10-11`

## Expected Contract Start Date
`2023-11-01`

## Expected Contract End Date
`2025-03-31`

## Contract Status
`Expired`

## Background
The Department of Justice Canada (JUS) is seeking a Standing Offer for French and English simultaneous interpretation services. The contract is to provide high-quality interpretation services for in-person, virtual, and/or hybrid meetings/events.

## Services Required
- Virtual interpretation services across Canada
- In-person interpretation services in the National Capital Region (NCR)
- Hybrid interpretation services (in-person in NCR and virtual across Canada)

## Tender Criteria
The contract is awarded to the lowest priced bidder. It is anticipated that up to three (3) Standing Offers will be awarded as a result of this Request for Standing Offer from the date of issuance to March 31, 2025. The option to extend the contract for two (2) additional periods of one (1) year each is also available.

## Contract Requirements
- Interpretation will be provided for spoken content only, excluding written information such as typed chat comments and PowerPoint slides
- The contractor must provide qualified interpreters ready to provide services at the specified date(s) and time(s)
- Meeting events may need to be recorded

## Security Requirements
- The contract requires security clearance and screening for personnel and organization

## Additional Information
- The Contract Security Program of Public Works and Government Services Canada provides information on personnel and organization security screening
- A contact security program is available to provide guidance on how to complete the application for registration form

## How to Apply
[Attachments](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8137/amendment-001---rfso-1000032416-%28en.pdf) including the RFSO, AFR Form, and Contact Security Program guidance are available for download. Proposals must be submitted electronically using the Canada Buys Web Portal. [Contact Information](#contact) is available for inquiries.
